name: Freedom Park Lagos
address: Old Prison Ground Broad Street, Lagos 23401 Nigeria
description: Freedom Park is a memorial and leisure park area in the middle of downtown Lagos in Lagos Island, Nigeria which was formerly Her Majesty's Broad Street Prison.

name: LUFASI Nature Park
address: Majek 1st Gate Km 41, Lekki, Lagos 106104 Nigeria
description: The Centre provide a meeting point for nature and leisure walk, outdoor sports, field research, school excursions, wildlife rescue & rehabilitation and other activities.

name: Nike Centre For Art And Culture
address: No. 2, Elegushi Road 3rd Roundabout, Epe Expressway, Lagos 106104 Nigeria
description: Nike Art Centre, Lagos, is one of Nigeria's hidden treasures. Located in Lekki, Lagos, the four-story building compromises of an art gallery and textile museum featuring over 7,000 pieces and soon to have Coffee shop.

name: Yankari National Park: A wildlife haven
description: Yankari National Park is a large wildlife reserve in the north of Nigeria, home to diverse species of animals, including elephants, lions, and various bird species.

name: Obudu Mountain Resort: A scenic plateau
address: Obudu, Cross River State, Southeastern Nigeria.
description: Obudu Mountain Resort is a picturesque plateau in Cross River State, known for its breathtaking views and outdoor activities like ziplining and hiking.

name: Lekki Conservation Centre: A natural reserve
address: Lekki Peninsula, Lagos State, Southwestern Nigeria.
description: The Lekki Conservation Centre is a wildlife sanctuary located on the Lekki Peninsula, offering a chance to observe the region's diverse flora and fauna.

name: Olumo Rock
description: Olumo Rock is a mountain in south-western Nigeria. It is located in the city of Abeokuta, Ogun State, and was normally used as a natural fortress during inter-tribal warfare in the 19th century. Its patron spirit is venerated in the Yoruba religion as an orisha.

name: Landmark Beach
address: Plot 3 & 4 Water Corporation Road, Lagos 100500 Nigeria
description: Landmark Beach, located in Lagos, Nigeria, is a family-centric entertainment beach known for its activities like jet skiing, kayaking, and boat cruises, as well as its relaxed atmosphere for evening drinks and relaxation.
